channel.title: My bot
channel.description:
So ya, I was working on this for around a week, didn't get too far
Credits to: PSB used his getMethod adder thing. frank_ idea for my InstructionSearcher, and for node hooks. sL for LoginIndex hook.
This also creates a new thread for an IRC Bot I had running from it, you can disable this in evil/bot/vortex/loader/VortexLoader find where I create the thread.
I'm releasing this cause I was mainly just wanting to see I could do it, now it's just annoying lol.
Some of my hooks will probably fail upon an update, so this is really just for you all to learn how to do it.
Download: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?dttgmybecxm]Vortex[/url]
P.S. Sorry, vortex, I didn't know that was your name till I saw you on IRC and was like "wtf" and looked you up in the members on here.

item.title: My bot
item.dc:creator: @super_OLDACCOUNT super_OLDACCOUNT
item.description:
@super_OLDACCOUNT wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:14, topic:172794”][quote author=super_ link=topic=232994.msg2153957#msg2153957 date=1207111484]

evil_ sorry to grave dig, but i need to ask you, when does it update? and i dont think it even loads the ‘hacked’ jar.

Look at the code (VortexModifiedClassLoader to be specific). It updates at runtime, then uses the injected class loader to grab the modified classes from the updater portion.

i did, but i dont see where they do new VertexModifiedClassLoader() :p.

edit: wait i see, the utf8 in the client is edited, and then from there when the client tries to load a class, it goes through the hacked one. i must say, thats pretty sweet
[/quote]
there are several ways, each in its own way can be justified. however this method has been used ever since ppls released his loader[/quote]
oi, anyways hi ollie. this is _cake

Read full topic
